programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: A powerful, twisting plot is well-realised by confident performances from Michael Douglas and Gwyneth Paltrow in this adaptation of Dial M For Murder. Douglas is slickly despicable as a high-powered businessman who learns that his beautiful wife is having an affair with artist David Shaw. When he learns that Shaw is actually an ex-con with a habit of defrauding rich women, the husband makes an intriguing proposal: he will give the artist half a million dollars in exchange for a single favour - the murder of his wife

programme.title: Making of 'The Martian'
programme.desc: A look at "The Martian," a 2015 adaptation of Andy Weir's novel about a lone astronaut who is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry. The film stars Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain and Jeff Daniels, and is directed by Ridley Scott

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Every December, safecracker Willie takes a job as a department store Santa. Every Christmas Eve, he robs the store and makes off with a lucrative haul. But is his boozy lifestyle killing his criminal record?

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Kung fu fighter Huo Jaunjia learns to fight honourably with the help of blind beauty Moon. Wushu action based on the life of a martial arts legend

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Six months have passed since the rage virus has annihilated the British Isles. The U.S. Army declares that the war against infection has been won, and that the reconstruction of the country can begin. As the first wave of refugees return, a family is reunited--but one of them unwittingly carries a terrible secret

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Ice cool Jason Statham transports anything, no questions asked. However, one package could be his undoing in this crime thriller from writer Luc Besson. Contains violence

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Upon release from jail, a con adopts his dead ex-cellmate's identity just to meet the man's girlfriend - but the girl's brother had plans to use the dead con's expert knowledge in a casino robbery, and the imposter is forced to take part. Also known as Reindeer Games

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: Aspiring EDM musician Cole works to hone his craft, and is taken under the wing of a jaded, successful DJ named James. However, the friendship between the two men sours when Cole begins to fall for James' beautiful girlfriend

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Taxicab Confessions
programme.sub-title: All's Fare in Love and Vegas
programme.desc: All's Fare in Love and Vegas. Unsuspecting riders in Las Vegas taxis reveal intimate details of their lives to hidden cameras. Included: a dancer describes her experiences in explicit films; a DJ laments the state of modern music; a gay man discusses his boyfriend of 11 years; an incest victim relates her troubled history

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Sequel to the apocalyptic thriller "28 Days Later" (2002) finds Londoners returning after the killer virus has been eradicated, or has it?(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: In this sequel to Friday, Ice Cube returns as the streetwise LA dude who grassed up a local gangster. Who's now out and on his trail. This would be a good time to chill out in the suburbs with cousin Mike Epps and uncle Don 'Dc' Curry, who happens to have won the lottery but, as he finds out, money can't buy you love or security in Steve Carr's smart comedy(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: From the producers of Independence Day and Godzilla. Spilled toxic waste results in giant jumping, weaving and trapdoor spiders that attack a small town in this fun comedy starring David Arquette, Kari Wührer and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge(n)

programme.title: The Salton Sea
programme.desc: Strange thriller told in flashbacks about Danny Parker, a speed-using trumpet player determined to cope with his drug madness and avenge the murder of his wife by corrupt cops(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Second sequel to the remake of the 1960 Rat Pack caper finds suave con man Danny Ocean and his crew plotting to rob a casino owner who double-crossed Danny's mentor(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: It was supposed to be a cool camping weekend for five friends after graduation. But everything changes when a stranger with a horrific, infectious skin condition shows up(n)

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. When a German holidaymaker begs the travellers to help find his brother, who went missing exploring an ancient Mayan temple, the group agrees to offer their assistance. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A TV producer seeks to expose a tobacco industry cover-up with the aid of an ex-research scientist, but winds up fighting a battle on multiple fronts when the network balks at airing the story(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman and Kate Beckinsale star in writer-director Stephen Sommers' breathless, all-action roller-coaster of a CGI monster-hunt. It's the late 19th century and a secret organisation within the Vatican is determinedly pursuing its ages-old mission to ensure the extinction of all supernatural beings that threaten mankind. Their star creature-killer is Gabriel Van Helsing, who starts the movie in Paris, where he's on the trail of a rampaging Mr Hyde. Van Helsing is then dispatched to Transylvania, where his assignment is to assist Princess Anna Valerious in her long-standing quest to defeat Count Dracula. Van Helsing is abetted by the ingenious but timid and risk-averse Carl, who churns out a stream of gadgets and weapons (much in the manner of James Bond's inventor Q) for our warrior hero. But the undead nobleman awaits them, and he has forged an unlikely but deadly alliance with other supernaturals... It's not the most intellectually challenging of films, but it's certainly a thrilling horror-tinged fairground ride(n)

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: College student Lewis Thomas takes a trip across country to pick up his dream girl, Venna. On the way he is joined by his brother Fuller and together they play a practical joke on a trucker over a CB radio. Now the trucker wants revenge..

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: A popular yet drunken actor reconnects with a group of his college friends for a wedding several years after graduation

programme.title: Summer Catch
programme.desc: Baseball could be the only ticket to success for hard-working Ryan. He wins a spot on the local team, but is caught between his off-field romance with holidaying Tenley and his sporting ambitions. Romcom with a good supporting cast

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain seeks out treasure in the Black Sea, despite a suspicion that he may be deceived

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Four successful men find themselves easing into long-term relationships, but they're not all that comfortable about it, in this intelligent comedy-drama. Terry (Shemar Moore), Jackson (Morris Chestnut), Brian (Bill Bellamy), and Derrick (D.L. Hughley) are four close friends who get together once a week to play basketball and compare notes on their problems with women. And as it turns out, they have a lot to say in that area. Terry has just gotten engaged to BeBe (Susan Dalian), who is more than a bit controlling. Jackson has a deep fear of commitment, symbolized by a recurring dream in which he's attacked by women wearing wedding gowns; what's more, he's started seeing Denise (Gabrielle Union), who he learns once had a fling with his dad (Clifton Powell). Brian is a lawyer who has discovered his next court date will see him pleading a case in front of a judge who used to be his girlfriend (Angelle Brooks). And Derrick's marriage to Sheila (Tamala Jones) is falling apart at the seams. The Brothers also features one-time Jeffersons regular Marla Gibbs, and Jennifer Lewis as Jackson's mother, who may be giving his father a second chance after many years apart

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teenagers awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer
programme.desc: An aspiring astronaut who was forced to forsake his dream of exploring space in order to save the family farm begins building his own personal rocket as a means of reaching the stars in this quirky rural drama starring Billy Bob Thornton. There once was a time when Charlie Farmer (Thornton) seemed like a shoo-in for NASA's esteemed astronaut training program. An Air Force pilot who held a degree in aerospace engineering, Charlie was well on his way to blasting off when a family crisis grounded his celestial aspirations. Of course, Charlie's feet may be firmly planted on terra firma these days, but his thoughts are constantly ascending into the clouds and beyond. It's been ten long years since the man who would navigate the stars began tending to the family farm, and during that time, Charlie has dedicated every moment of his spare time to building the rocket that will one day launch him into space. Though his devoted wife, Audie (Virginia Madsen), the pair's three children, Sunshine, Stanley, and Shepard, and even his father-in-law, Hal (Bruce Dern), all support Charlie in achieving his lifelong goal of becoming the nation's first independent astronaut, a last-minute hitch on the eve before the big launch unexpectedly stalls Charlie's countdown. It seems that Charlie's quest to obtain a substantial amount of high-grade rocket fuel has attracted the attention of not only the FBI, but the CIA, the FAA, and the United States military as well. Now, as the powers that be attempt to ground Charlie, citing concerns for civilian safety, a media frenzy descends upon the once-quiet farm as the reluctant renegade hero vows to show his children just how far one's courage and willingness to pursue one's own ideals can get a person when one refuses to give up hope. Northfork writing/directing duo Mark and Michael Polish team up to tell the tale of a man considered an oddity by his neighbors, a criminal by the government, and an inspiration by the media and the people

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: A healthcare tycoon is forced to share his hospital room with a mechanic when both are diagnosed with terminal cancer. The combative pair discover a shared interest in making the most of their remaining time

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(r)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: An exemplary biopic that focuses on the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece "In Cold Blood"(n)

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: Adaptation of Craig Lucas's play, concerning an unusual occurrence at the wedding reception of a Chicago couple (Alec Baldwin, Meg Ryan). Leah: Kathy Bates. Dr. Boyle: Ned Beatty. Mrs. Boyle: Patty Duke. Jerry: Richard Riehle. Old Man: Sydney Walker. Taylor: Stanley Tucci. Tom: Rocky Carroll. Directed by Norman Rene(n)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Pharmacy; Incoming Tide. In the first two parts of this four-part adaptation of Elizabeth Strout's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel spanning 25 years in a small Maine town, math teacher Olive Kitteridge helps Kevin, a smart but timid student whose mom is suffering from depression, a gesture that annoys her son, Christopher. Years later, the twentysomething Kevin returns to the area, and Olive ropes him into attending Christopher's wedding-rehearsal dinner(n)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: A Different Road; Security. In the final two parts, Christopher suggests counseling to his mother after she and Henry have a scary episode following dinner with friends. Later, Olive visits Christopher and his second wife in New York, but abruptly returns to Maine, where she gets some bad news about Henry and ultimately befriends a lonely widower she meets while out for a walk(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy cum thriller in which a man killed by a mugger returns as his young girlfriend's ghostly guardian. Realising, in his spirit state, that his murder was premeditated and that her life is in great danger, he tries to make contact through a fake spiritualist. But will his girlfriend take the woman seriously?(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A TV producer seeks to expose a tobacco industry cover-up with the aid of an ex-research scientist, but winds up fighting a battle on multiple fronts when the network balks at airing the story(n)

programme.title: Ballers (?)
programme.desc: Elidee(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials (?)
The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a tribe of cannibals(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: Director Sam Taylor-Johnson's big screen version of the initial book in the series, Fifty Shades of Grey, stars Dakota Johnson as Anastasia Steele, an English Lit major on the verge of graduation when her best friend, a journalism major, gets sick and asks Anastasia to do an assignment for her -- interview Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan), the wealthy businessman who is speaking at their impending graduation ceremony. The two hit it off right away; the awkward young woman is immediately turned on by his power and control, and he's drawn to her naivete(n)

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A young suburban girl is abducted by spirits that have besieged her family's home. Desperate, her parents devise a plan to rescue her from the other side(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn Wade sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses, funky music, a hot onboard dance club, and a bathroom attendant(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Comedy about a soldier who is thrown out of the army and ends up training a group of junior cadets(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Young Greek student Nia Vardalos causes uproar in her exuberant but traditional family when she brings home non-Greek new man John Corbett(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone(n)

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: Inspired by The Canterbury Tales, as well as the story of Ulrich von Lichtenstein, this is the story of William, a young squire with a gift for jousting. After his master dies suddenly, the squire hits the road with his cohorts Roland and Wat. On the journey, they stumble across an unknown writer, Chaucer. William, lacking a proper pedigree, convinces Chaucer to forge genealogy documents that will pass him off as a knight. With his newly-minted history in hand, the young man sets out to prove himself a worthy knight at the country's jousting competition, and finds romance along the way(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Congressman Evan Baxter is settling into a new life of political importance when God appears and tells him to build an ark. Evan thinks he's going mad, but before long, animals and deliveries of wood persuade him that it might be his destiny to be the modern-day Noah after all(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: A mysterious being is found in the pool of an apartment complex. She clearly comes from another world, and it seems she may not be alone. Now the neighbors will have to save her if they are to save themselves from whatever is after her. M. Night Shyamalan works his Academy Award-nominated, spellbinding craftsmanship into an unexpected story that features mesmerizing images, not to mention a breathtaking cast: Bryce Dallas Howard, Paul Giamatti, Jeffrey Wright and Sarita Choudhury(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Ensemble drama that follows the broken lives of several LA residents(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger woos a young woman and brings her to his mansion atop a clay mountain. There, she learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets as she fights for her sanity and her very life(n)

programme.title: The Sand Pebbles
programme.desc: This film tells the story of an American marine engineer who is stationed on China's Yangtze River in 1926. Though he'd prefer to stay below deck and work on the engines, he falls in love with a missionary, and through his romance, he becomes aware of the Chinese political climate(n)

programme.title: MacArthur
programme.desc: Biopic of General Douglas MacArthur, one of the most famous commanders of the Korean and Second World Wars, who famously clashed with President Truman after defying orders in the Korean War(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: A Nigerian couple in the U.S. clash over a traditional circumcision for their 10-year-old daughter. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2015 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: Although it fizzles at first, this true story of a 1945 mission to free Allied POWs in the Philippines during World War II sizzles once the daring rescue gets under way(n)

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: George Clooney and two pals escape the chain gang and go on a quest for treasure in 1930s Mississippi. Another shot of comic moonshine from the Coen brothers. (2000)(103 mins)(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: An undercover cop is given the job of tracking down a small-time crook so he can testify against a drug lord(n)

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected(n)

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. However, once in court, Crawford, representing himself, proceeds to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him. Can he possibly get away with his crime?(n)

In 480 BC, the ambitious King Xerxes of Persia plans to invade Greece with his massive army to extend his slave empire. But the brave King Leonidas intervenes demanding that his 300 Spartan warriors block the only way by land to reach Greece, engaging them in a narrow canyon where they cannot take full advantage of their number. The battle is a suicide mission, meant to buy time for the rest of the Greek forces to prepare for the invasion. However, that doesn't stop the soldiers from throwing their hearts into the fight, determined to take as many Persians as possible with them(n)

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: First-time screenwriter Stelios Pavlou enjoyed a major success with this script that he wrote while working in an English liquor store by sending it to actor Samuel L. Jackson, who signed on for one of the lead roles. Jackson is Elmo McElroy, a kilt-wearing, golf club-wielding Los Angeles native who has invented an illegal drug formula that he hopes will provide him with a last major score of 20 million dollars before he retires from a life of crime. He travels to Liverpool, England, where he hopes to find a buyer for his creation among the denizens of the city's rave scene, but his plans go awry when those who are in on the deal start turning up dead. Elmo's only protector is a chain-smoking, Yank-hating local hood named Felix De Souza (Robert Carlyle), who reluctantly partners with the violence-prone American to finish the deal and cash in, sparking a gang war between Elmo's vengeful one-time employer, The Lizard (Meat Loaf); Felix's boss, Durant (Ricky Tomlinson); crooked cop Virgil Kane (Sean Pertwee); a beautiful assassin, who also happens to be Felix's ex-girlfriend (Emily Mortimer); and an offbeat, yoga-practicing nightclub owner and mobster named Iki (Rhys Ifans). For its U.S. release, the title of The 51st State was changed to Formula 51(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight. (2001)(160 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: In the exciting final chapter of "The Hobbit" series, Bilbo Baggins and his traveling companions get caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth(n)

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: A naïve midwife working at a London hospital becomes entangled with Russian mobsters in this crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana transforms into Wonder Woman and battles Ares to save her people in this action-packed animated adventure featuring the voice of Keri Russell as the Amazonian superheroine. Other voices include Nathan Fillion, Alfred Molina, Rosario Dawson and Virginia Madsen(n)

programme.title: Village of the Damned
programme.desc: John Carpenter's remake of the 1960 classic about the takeover of a town by telepathic children. Christopher Reeve, Kirstie Alley. Jill: Linda Kozlowski. Frank: Michael Pare. Melanie: Meredith Salenger. Rev. George: Mark Hamill. From the novel "The Midwich Cuckoos."(n)

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: After moving to an old farmhouse with their mother, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Hit action film with Sylvester Stallone, a bomb expert, and Sharon Stone who asks him to avenge her family's murder(n)

programme.title: Stanhope
programme.desc: A teen in New York City gets caught up in crime as he tries to help his mom support the family(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically-engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylized adaptation of the popular video game(n)

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Muddled mix of action and politics centering on an elite group of FBI agents who clash with local authorities in Saudi Arabia while investigating a terrorist bombing of a Western housing compound(n)

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle(n)

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Gary Fleder's thriller, based on James Patterson's novel, stars Morgan Freeman in his first outing as forensic psychologist Alex Cross. Called in to track the kidnapper and killer of young girls, he's joined by Dr Kate McTiernan, who has escaped the killer's dungeon. The investigation gets personal when his niece Naomi is kidnapped(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: A mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: Writer-director M. Night Shyamalan's atmospheric thriller is set in a 19th-century town, where the residents are terrified that they'll be attacked by the mysterious creatures in the nearby woods. Look for Bryce Dallas Howard's star-making turn as Ivy(n)

programme.title: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: Gene Wilder stars in Mel Brooks' seminal Western spoof about the first black sheriff in an all-white town. No taboo is off limits in this uproarious comedy classic(n)

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: The top-secret test of a sub-miniaturization process goes wildly awry in this comic adventure when industrial spies steal the technology and the daring pilot (Dennis Quaid) of the world's first molecular-sized craft is accidentally injected into the bloodstream of a hypochondriac grocery store clerk (Martin Short). Now with only a 24-hour supply of oxygen, an atom-sized test pilot must convince the nerd in whose body he is trapped how to be a hero in order to recover the stolen technology, convince the pilot's girlfriend (Meg Ryan) that he loves her ... and save both men from a grisly death(n)

programme.title: Death Defying Acts
programme.desc: Catherine Zeta-Jones and Guy Pearce display a mesmerizing screen magic in this intriguing romantic drama set in 1926 Edinburgh. Zeta-Jones plays a beautiful con artist who poses as a fake medium to bilk illusionist Harry Houdini (Pearce), who has offered $10,000 to any psychic who can conjure up his late mother's final words. While getting to know the grifter, the famous escape artist begins to develop a personal attachment to her. Saoirse Ronan. Directed by Gillian Armstrong(n)

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: In what is widely regarded as his best film, Steven Seagal plays lowly Navy chef Casy Ryback on board the USS Missouri, a nuclear-armed battleship. But when the ship is seized by terrorist William Stranix and renegade officer Commander Krill, Ryback reveals his true identity: he's an ex-navy SEAL seeing out his time as a chef after an 'incident'. Now Ryback must use all his old skills to take on the baddies. Andrew Davis's all-action film co-stars Erika Eleniak as Jordan Tate, Playboy's Miss July 1989, who tags along with Ryback for safety, and acts as a foil for the humorous spats between the pair in the rare moments between the kick-ass action(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A revved-up comic joyride about four middle-aged, upper middle-class buddies attacking their collective mid-life crises by hitting the road on motorcycles

programme.title: When the Game Stands Tall

On their arrival, the two men become stranded in the wilderness and find themselves being pursued by a ferocious bear. As they fight for their very lives, one man becomes convinced that the other is plotting his death(n)

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this tense thriller Rowman (James Marsden) arrives at his childhood home in Alaska to pay respects to his late father. He's joined by his brother, Beckett (Thomas Jane) a local law enforcement officer who has just witnessed a bloody scene involving two bootleg cutters who were killed by a grizzly. In an attempt to stop the bear, Douglass (Billy Bob Thornton) an experienced tracker is dispatched into the forest to locate the creature. As the parties converge, they discover that something is mysteriously driving the bears out of the maze. When a grizzly turns his attention to the group, they realize they are the ones being hunted. Directed by David Hackl(n)

programme.desc: The Freeling family is once again spooked by supernatural forces in this sequel to the 1982 blockbuster. JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson, Heather O'Rourke. Robbie: Oliver Robins. Tangina: Zelda Rubinstein. Taylor: Will Sampson. Kane: Julian Beck. Gramma: Geraldine Fitzgerald. Brian Gibson directed(n)

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Widowed when his FBI agent wife is killed in an FBI anti-terrorist operation gone wrong, a college professor becomes increasingly obsessed with the culture and sub-society of these dangerous groups. The arrival of new neighbours gives him new spirit, as they are gregarious and friendly, with two children that his son can be friends with. He is even beginning to see another woman. However, he begins to suspect something is odd about the neighbours, something about the way they don't want him to see certain parts of the house or a set of blueprints they have there. Are his neighbours terrorists... or is the stress of losing his wife merely driving him past the point of paranoia?(n)

On their arrival, the two men become stranded in the wilderness and find themselves being pursued by a ferocious bear. As they fight for their very lives, one man becomes convinced that the other is plotting his death(n)

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: The first film by writer/director David O. Russell since 1999's Three Kings finds the filmmaker working with an ensemble cast that includes Dustin Hoffman, Lily Tomlin, Jude Law, Naomi Watts, and Mark Wahlberg. Hoffman and Tomlin are a married couple who run a detective agency focusing on existential troubles. Law and Watts play another couple who enlist their services. Isabelle Huppert, Jason Schwartzman, and Kevin Dunn round out the ensemble

programme.title: Three...Extremes
programme.desc: A trio of frighteningly good horror tales, directed by Asian maestros Takashi Miike (Japan), Fruit Chan (Hong Kong) and Chan-wook Park (Korea), puts viewers on edge of their seats---or covering their eyes in terror. One of them, Chan's "Dumplings," about a mysterious woman (Bai Ling) whose delectable delicacies have rejuvenating powers that reverse the aging process, was expanded into a full-length feature film. Miriam Yeung, Tony Ko-Fai Leung, Lee Byung-Hun

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their initial career lasted only 26 months, the Sex Pistols changed the music scene forever. This intimate and shocking portrait of the notorious punk rock band documents their rise from the streets of 70's London through their crucifixion by the tabloids, canonization by fans around the world and ultimately their implosion on tour in America

programme.title: White Nights
programme.desc: Adventure in which Mikhail Baryshnikov plays a Soviet ballet star who finds himself back in the USSR after a defection attempt misfires. In desperation, he teams up with an expatriate American tap dance and together they plot their bid to return to freedom

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: An athletics coach shapes a team into state champions in the 1980s. Inspired by actual events

programme.title: Melinda and Melinda
programme.desc: Woody Allen's bitingly funny comedy is about two playwrights who come up with two versions of a story about a neurotic New Yorker named Melinda (Radha Mitchell, who plays both characters), who's trying to clean up her life

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Miles is distressed about his lack of success as a novelist, and Jack is an equally unsuccessful actor with a rapidly approaching wedding. In a last-ditch effort to sow their wild oats, Jack and Miles take off on a final road trip to California's wine country the week prior to Jack's wedding. (S) (Includes RTÉ News and Weather followed by iWitness)

programme.title: Love Is Strange
programme.desc: A committed gay couple's fledgling marriage is challenged by a series of unexpected setbacks. When George is fired from his teaching position at a Catholic school, he and Ben lose the New York City apartment they have shared for 20 years. Now in order to get back on their feet, they are both forced into uncomfortable living arrangements that put their union to the ultimate test

programme.title: The Fourth Kind
programme.desc: An Alaskan psychiatrist suspects her patients' strange behaviour may be a result of alien abduction

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: An athletics coach shapes a team into state champions in the 1980s. Inspired by actual events

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Sassenach. While on her second honeymoon, World War II combat nurse Claire Randall, played by Irish actress Caitriona Balfe, is mysteriously transported back in time to 1743 Scotland. After an encounter with a British soldier, she's kidnapped by a group of Scottish Highlanders whose ranks include an injured young man named Jamie

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Castle Leoch. Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: In this historical drama, idealistic German public prosecutor Johann Radmann (Alexander Fehling) becomes interested in the case of Charles Schulz, a former Nazi officer at Auschwitz who is now a schoolteacher. Radmann initially encounters resistance from the rest of his department when he begins his investigation, but senior prosecutor Walter Friedberg (Robert Hunger-Buhler) ultimately allows him to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. Helmed by first-time feature-film director Giulio Ricciarelli, Labyrinth of Lies is based on the Frankfurt Auschwitz trials, a previously lesser-known chapter of Germany's post-WWII history in which the country was forced to reckon with the Nazis who returned to everyday life following the end of the war. Germany's official Foreign Language submission for the 2016 Academy Awards. Friederike Becht, Andre Szymanski, and Hansi Jochmann co-star

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war(n)

programme.title: The Fourth Kind
programme.desc: Set in the fall of 2000 and purportedly based on actual events, The Fourth Kind stars Milla Jovovich as Dr. Abigail Tyler, a Nome, Alaska-based psychotherapist whose videotaped sessions with her patients offer the most compelling evidence of alien abduction ever documented. Elias Koteas and Will Patton co-star(n)

programme.title: The Story of Us
programme.desc: Two jilted lovers spend fifteen years of marriage together, only to find that they might no longer love each other. In this time they have two children and go through the various (dramatic and comical) events that take place in an average marriage(n)

programme.title: Red Army
programme.desc: An entertaining look at the Soviet Union's national hockey team and their decades of success in the sport. The filmmakers also profile superstar player Slava Fetisov, who turned to politics after his hockey career(n)

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep stars as an actress who rebuilds her life after drug rehab with the help of her overbearing mother. Based on Carrie Fisher's autobiographical novel(n)

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle director Stephen Chow returns to the helm for this sci-fi comedy about a struggling single father whose quest to find the perfect toy yields out-of-this-world results. Ti (Chow) is a poor construction worker who breaks his back to ensure that his young son Dicky (Xu Jiao) can stay enrolled in an exclusive private school. But while Ti does everything possible to give his son the opportunities that he never had, Dicky still feels like a classroom reject due to his tattered clothes and lack of the latest toys. Dicky's classmates all play with the coolest and most expensive gadgets that money can buy, so how is a kid who gets his toys from the local junkyard ever supposed to fit in? One day, while scrounging through the trash heap in search of a new toy, Ti discovers a mysterious orb and brings it straight back to Dicky. Though at first the "CJ7" appears to be little more than an unidentifiable oddity, it proves to be much, much more once the young boy starts to play with it. This isn't your average action figure, but a living "pet" with extraordinary powers. Realizing that his new toy may be just the thing to help him fit in with his demanding classmates, Dicky brings the CJ7 to school with him in order to show it off and have some fun. But the CJ7 has its own ideas about how to have fun, and it isn't long before the situation at school gets hopelessly out of hand(n)

programme.title: The Emperor's Club
programme.desc: In this rewarding drama, Kevin Kline gives a stellar performance as a dedicated teacher at a boys prep school, circa 1976. Kline's Mr. Hundert doesn't just teach his students about Roman and Greek history, he offers them lessons in life, morality and character. But when an unruly transfer student enters his classroom, Mr. Hundert's resolve is seriously tested. Emile Hirsch, Rob Morrow(n)

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: A prim and proper teacher becomes a rampaging vigilante in this powerhouse drama(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: In this drama that explores greed and corruption in American business, Giovanni Ribisi plays Seth Davis, an intelligent and ambitious college dropout who runs a casino in his apartment. Eager to show his father that he can succeed, Seth lands a job with a small stock brokerage firm. He is given a space in the company's "boiler room," where he makes cold calls to prospective clients. As it turns out, Seth has a genuine talent for cold calling, which gains him the approval of his superiors, the admiration of his father, and the attentions of one of his co-workers, Abby Hilliard (Nia Long). However, the higher up the ladder Seth rises, the deeper he sinks into a quagmire of dirty dealings, until he's breaking the law in order to keep his bosses happy and his paychecks coming. The Boiler Room also features Tom Everett Scott, Scott Caan, Jamie Kennedy, Nicky Katt, and Ben Affleck in a cameo as the headhunter who brings Seth into the firm. Ribisi and Scott also appeared together in That Thing You Do; Ribisi was the drummer replaced by Scott, who then led The One-Ders to fictional pop stardom(n)

programme.title: Red Army
programme.desc: An entertaining look at the Soviet Union's national hockey team and their decades of success in the sport. The filmmakers also profile superstar player Slava Fetisov, who turned to politics after his hockey career(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Way Out. Claire uses her medical skills to escape Castle Leoch, and with help from Jamie, tends to a sick child. Later, during the evening entertainment, Claire listens to a tale that offers her hope for freedom(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Gathering. Claire plots to escape during the Castle's Gathering ceremony, but encounters with Jamie and a drunken Dougal alter her plans(n)

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: American independent filmmaker Gus Van Sant's powerful, much-admired drama of drug-addiction, centred on addict Bob who leads his "crew" - wife Dianne, henchman Rick and his girlfriend Nadine - on a series of robberies in the Pacific Northwest. Wide(n)

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: A prim and proper teacher becomes a rampaging vigilante in this powerhouse drama(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: The Farrelly Brothers set this romantic comedy in their home state of Rhode Island. In 1985, when teen-nerd Ted Stroehmann (Ben Stiller) challenges a high-schooler who's bullying retarded Warren Jenson (W. Earl Brown), his concern prompts Warren's sister, the dazzling and desirable Mary Jenson (Cameron Diaz) to choose Ted as her senior prom date, a fact Ted's pals find hard to believe. However, on prom night, Ted gets his penis caught in his zipper, so the much-desired date never happens. Living in Providence and waxing nostalgic 13 years later, Ted hires Pat Healy (Matt Dillon) to locate Mary, and the creepy private investigator finds her in Miami, where she lives with her tan-shriveled roommate Magda (Lin Shaye). After Pat develops a stalker-style fixation on the lovely, unattached Mary, he lies to Ted, telling him that she's now an overweight mother confined to a wheelchair. Employing professional eavesdropping equipment, Pat gathers a dossier on Mary's life and future plans, information that forms the basis for more lies when Pat begins dating her. Sure enough, Mary falls for Pat, although her friend Tucker (Lee Evans) is very suspicious of Pat's claim to be a Harvard-educated architect. Meanwhile, Ted learns the truth but continues to encounter offbeat obstacles as he accelerates to Miami in hopes of finding happiness with his true love. Former Modern Lovers singer Jonathan Richman vocalizes a narrative ballad of onscreen commentary in the Cat Ballou (1965) tradition. Most of the cast sings and frolics to Build Me Up, Buttercup by The Foundations during the closing credits(n)

programme.title: Land Ho!
programme.desc: Two retirees take an invigorating trip to Iceland in a bid to recapture the spirit of their youth. Along the way, they experience the Reykjavik nightlife, have amorous encounters, soak in spas and raise a little hell(n)

programme.title: Fools Rush In
programme.desc: Three months after their short-lived fling in Las Vegas, buttoned-down businessman Alex (Matthew Perry) learns that free-spirited Isabel (Salma Hayek), a Mexican-American, is pregnant. They decide to follow their hearts and get married, but they must deal with the resulting culture clash between their families. Jon Tenney, Jill Clayburgh(n)

programme.title: Dysfunctional Friends
programme.desc: Ten college friends reunite after seven years to inherit the fortune of a recently deceased pal, a successful Internet mogul whose will stipulates that they must spend five days together in order to receive the money(n)

programme.title: What Love Is
programme.desc: Poolhall Junkies actor/writer/director Mars Callahan once again pulls triple duty with this battle of the sexes comedy starring Cuba Gooding, Jr., Sean Astin, Matthew Lillard, Gina Gershon, and Anne Hesche. It's Valentine's Day, and Sarah (Victoria Pratt) has just kicked longtime boyfriend Tom (Gooding, Jr.) to the curb. Now, as Tom's friends Sal (Lillard), Ken (Callahan), George (Astin), and Wayne (Andrew Daly) drop by to discuss the shortcomings of the female gender, Sarah and her friends congregate in the bathroom to bond over stories about sex and relationships(n)

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: Peter Gibbons (Ron Livingston) is a computer programmer working for Initech in Houston. Every day, he and his friends Samir (Ajay Naidu) and Michael Bolton (David Herman as not THAT Michael Bolton), suffer endless indignities and humiliations in their soulless workspace from their soulless boss, Bill Lumbergh (Gary Cole). For Peter, stuck in his cookie-cutter apartment with paper-thin walls and IKEA furniture, every day is worse than the one before it -- so every day is the worst of his life. To cap it off, Initech has hired a pair of "efficiency experts" to downsize the company. One Friday night, Peter's soon to be ex-girlfriend Anne (Alexandra Wentworth) forces him to go to an occupational hypnotherapist to relieve work stress. While Peter is under hypnosis, the therapist keels over and dies. As he never snaps out of his hypnotic state, Peter has a new outlook on life. If something annoys him, he just ignores it or walks away from it. He is completely relaxed and enjoying life for the first time in a long time. On Monday, Peter skips work and sleeps in. He gets up for lunch and drives down to a restaurant next to his office and asks the waitress he's had a crush on, Joanna (Jennifer Aniston), on a date. When Peter stops into the office to pick up his organizer, he's called in to talk to the efficiency experts. Relaxed and friendly, Peter charms them as he describes everything wrong with the office, including his boss. Even as Peter now appears at work only as the mood strikes him, the experts decide he's management material and give him a promotion even as they lay off the hardworking Samir and Michael. Peter then convinces his friends to exact revenge on Initech based upon an idea from Superman III. Not everything works out quite as planned. Office Space originated from writer/director Mike Judge's first animated short of the same name, created in 1991. The short was about Milton (reproduced in the film by Stephen Root), a damaged office drone whose complaints and threats about his sufferings go unheeded(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: The Farrelly Brothers set this romantic comedy in their home state of Rhode Island. In 1985, when teen-nerd Ted Stroehmann (Ben Stiller) challenges a high-schooler who's bullying retarded Warren Jenson (W. Earl Brown), his concern prompts Warren's sister, the dazzling and desirable Mary Jenson (Cameron Diaz) to choose Ted as her senior prom date, a fact Ted's pals find hard to believe. However, on prom night, Ted gets his penis caught in his zipper, so the much-desired date never happens. Living in Providence and waxing nostalgic 13 years later, Ted hires Pat Healy (Matt Dillon) to locate Mary, and the creepy private investigator finds her in Miami, where she lives with her tan-shriveled roommate Magda (Lin Shaye). After Pat develops a stalker-style fixation on the lovely, unattached Mary, he lies to Ted, telling him that she's now an overweight mother confined to a wheelchair. Employing professional eavesdropping equipment, Pat gathers a dossier on Mary's life and future plans, information that forms the basis for more lies when Pat begins dating her. Sure enough, Mary falls for Pat, although her friend Tucker (Lee Evans) is very suspicious of Pat's claim to be a Harvard-educated architect. Meanwhile, Ted learns the truth but continues to encounter offbeat obstacles as he accelerates to Miami in hopes of finding happiness with his true love. Former Modern Lovers singer Jonathan Richman vocalizes a narrative ballad of onscreen commentary in the Cat Ballou (1965) tradition. Most of the cast sings and frolics to Build Me Up, Buttercup by The Foundations during the closing credits(n)

programme.title: Anywhere but Here
programme.desc: Fed up with her small-town Bay City existence, Adele August leaves her family and second husband and heads for Beverley Hills with her daughter. The teenager resents the move and her mother's always flamboyant behaviour and in turn plans to get away to university on the east coast. Mum's plans are different - she wants a movie star for a daughter(n)

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: A teen discovers his neighbor is a vampire, and when all of his friends and family disregard his claims out of hand, he's forced to hire an actor who appeared in numerous horror films to help him protect himself and his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Fools Rush In
programme.desc: Three months after their short-lived fling in Las Vegas, buttoned-down businessman Alex (Matthew Perry) learns that free-spirited Isabel (Salma Hayek), a Mexican-American, is pregnant. They decide to follow their hearts and get married, but they must deal with the resulting culture clash between their families. Jon Tenney, Jill Clayburgh(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: The Farrelly Brothers set this romantic comedy in their home state of Rhode Island. programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: Peter Gibbons (Ron Livingston) is a computer programmer working for Initech in Houston. Every day, he and his friends Samir (Ajay Naidu) and Michael Bolton (David Herman as not THAT Michael Bolton), suffer endless indignities and humiliations in their soulless workspace from their soulless boss, Bill Lumbergh (Gary Cole). For Peter, stuck in his cookie-cutter apartment with paper-thin walls and IKEA furniture, every day is worse than the one before it -- so every day is the worst of his life. To cap it off, Initech has hired a pair of "efficiency experts" to downsize the company. One Friday night, Peter's soon to be ex-girlfriend Anne (Alexandra Wentworth) forces him to go to an occupational hypnotherapist to relieve work stress. While Peter is under hypnosis, the therapist keels over and dies. As he never snaps out of his hypnotic state, Peter has a new outlook on life. If something annoys him, he just ignores it or walks away from it. He is completely relaxed and enjoying life for the first time in a long time. On Monday, Peter skips work and sleeps in. He gets up for lunch and drives down to a restaurant next to his office and asks the waitress he's had a crush on, Joanna (Jennifer Aniston), on a date. When Peter stops into the office to pick up his organizer, he's called in to talk to the efficiency experts. Relaxed and friendly, Peter charms them as he describes everything wrong with the office, including his boss. Even as Peter now appears at work only as the mood strikes him, the experts decide he's management material and give him a promotion even as they lay off the hardworking Samir and Michael. Peter then convinces his friends to exact revenge on Initech based upon an idea from Superman III. Not everything works out quite as planned. Office Space originated from writer/director Mike Judge's first animated short of the same name, created in 1991. The short was about Milton (reproduced in the film by Stephen Root), a damaged office drone whose complaints and threats about his sufferings go unheeded(n)

programme.desc: A teen discovers his neighbor is a vampire, and when all of his friends and family disregard his claims out of hand, he's forced to hire an actor who appeared in numerous horror films to help him protect himself and his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of video-game characters in this wild action comedy. In response, the U.S. president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest (?)
To Sir, With Love II
programme.desc: Peter Bogdanovich directed this made-for-TV sequel to the well-remembered 1967 drama To Sir With Love. After 30 years as a teacher in a rough-and-tumble London school, Mark Thackeray (Sidney Poitier) finally retires and returns to America, settling into what he imagines will be a quiet life in Chicago. But Thackeray soon discovers that the nearby high school is not unlike the school he left behind in London -- run down, lacking discipline, and in dire need of teachers who genuinely care about their students. Thackeray decides to volunteer his services to the school, and soon finds himself teaching a history class to the toughest students he's ever had to face. Lulu and Judy Geeson, who starred as Poitier's students in the first film, make cameo appearances in To Sir With Love II, with Daniel J. Travanti and Jeff Sill highlighting the supporting cast of the sequel

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Nuclear testing once again awakens a green behemoth. However, this large iguana-like creature seems to be unrelated to its Japanese counterpart. The lizard proceeds to demolish large portions of New York as the US military attempts to destroy it

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: Comedy in which the TV family of the 1970s is transplanted to 90s LA. All six members of the family are still living as though it was the 70s, which causes problems when Mike tries to pitch for a new contract, Marcia goes on the run and Peter starts to go through puberty

programme.title: Gawayn
programme.desc: Supersized Rex. The Duke accidentally turns Rex into a giant who, in turn, turns on him

programme.title: The Final Season
programme.desc: A place where baseball is more than just a game fights to hold on to the national pastime in this drama inspired by a true story. Norway, IA, is a little town where folks take baseball seriously -- so much so that even though Norway's high school boasts less than a hundred students, their baseball team has brought home the state championship 19 times. Jim Van Scoyoc (Powers Boothe), Norway High's baseball coach, has received national attention for his skill with players, and when passionate baseball fan Kent Stock (Sean Astin) lands a teaching position nearby, he volunteers to work as an assistant for Van Scoyoc. While Stock cherishes his time with Van Scoyoc, he takes a job working in Saint Louis, where he plans to move with his fiancée. However, he changes his plans when he gets some unexpected news -- due to shrinking enrollment and budget cuts, Norway's high school is soon to close, and their upcoming baseball season is likely to be their last. Over the fierce objections of his girlfriend, Stock passes on the job in St. Louis to spend one last spring in Norway and help Van Scoyoc as he takes one last shot at taking his team to the state championship. Meanwhile, the citizens of Norway wage a legal battle to keep the school open, and the state sends a lawyer, Polly Hudson (Rachael Leigh Cook), to Norway to represent them. While Stock and Hudson are bitter enemies at the start of the season, with time she begins to understand the sense of tradition and love of the game that fuels Stock and the people of Norway. Also featuring Larry Miller, Tom Arnold, and Michael Angarano, The Final Season received its world premiere at the 2007 Tribeca Film Festival

programme.title: October Sky
programme.desc: The true story of a boy in a 50s mining town who, inspired by the Sputnik satellite, reaches for the stars

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh directs Disney's 2015, live-action take on the classic fairy tale Cinderella, which stars Lily James as the put-upon young women forced to endure a life of labor at the hands of her stepmother (Cate Blanchett) after her father dies unexpectedly. Forced to do every menial chore imaginable, Ella maintains her good spirits and eventually strikes up a friendship with a stranger in the woods who turns out to be the prince. When the royal court holds a gala ball, Cinderella wants nothing more to attend, and although her stepmother won't allow it, she gets help from a surprising source

programme.title: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
programme.desc: When one of the most loveable characters from Sesame Street realises he has lost his favourite blanket in Grouchland, he embarks on an adventure in the hope of retrieving it. During his attempts to find the treasured item, Elmo encounters a weird assortment of grumpy, ill-mannered characters but soon learns the value of sharing

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie stars as the dark fairy who places a terrible curse on the king's daughter in this spectacular fairy tale adventure. With Elle Fanning. Flashing images

programme.title: Godzilla

programme.title: October Sky
programme.desc: The Russians have sent a satellite into space. Meanwhile, four American schoolboys, intent on leaving their small mining town, design a rocket for a local science fair. Laura Dern stars as a school teacher(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Comedian Cedric the Entertainer serves as both producer and star of this comedy about a family who discovers just how much can go wrong en route to a family get-together. When Nate Johnson (Cedric the Entertainer) is invited to a big family reunion in Missouri, he sees it as an opportunity to reconnect with his estranged wife and growing children, as well as a chance to show up his wealthier know-it-all brother, Mack (Steve Harvey). Nate takes delivery on an expensive new SUV, persuades his recently separated wife, Dorothy (Vanessa L. Williams), to tag along, and packs up his three kids -- nubile teenager Nikki (Solange Knowles), under-age wannabe rapper D.J. (Bow Wow), and precocious seven-year-old Destiny (Gabby Soleil) -- for what he imagines will be a leisurely drive from Los Angeles to St. Louis. However, between his wary wife, arguing kids, angry police officers, bizarre hitchhikers, bad diner food, and an unfortunate run-in with a cement mixer, getting from point A to point B proves to be just short of a nightmare. Johnson Family Vacation was the first feature film for director Christopher Erskin, who previously distinguished himself directing music videos for the likes of Missy Elliot, TLC, and Boyz II Men(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Charged performances by Steve Howey and Mike Vogel kick-start this high-octane thrill ride about driven motorcycle-racing brothers competing against each other on the professional circuit. K.C. Carlyle (Howey) lands a lucrative sponsorship with a factory team, but younger brother Trip (Vogel), the better rider, must make his way as an independent "privateer." Real-life motocross star Tyler Evans has a cameo as himself. Directed by Steve Boyum. Cameron Richardson, Sophia Bush, Robert Carradine(n)

programme.title: Gotta Catch Santa Claus
programme.desc: William Shatner provides the voice of Santa Claus in this Christmas cartoon featuring vibrantly colored animation and upbeat holiday tunes. The musical adventure follows kids Trevor and Veronica as they attempt to track down jolly old St. Nick (and prove that he exists!) before an ice monster named LeFreeze gets to him first and puts a permanent end to the holiday season(n)

programme.title: Gawayn
programme.desc: Shopping Frenzy. The Questers' old nemesis Spyder seeks revenge when they encounter one another at a local super store(n)

programme.title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: Adventure flies higher than ever before in this sequel that finds championship air-racer Dusty Crophopper (voice of Dane Cook) beginning an exciting new career fighting forest fires. In the wake of another successful racing season, Dusty returns home to Propwash Junction to resume his training. But a debilitating injury forces Rusty to consider a new career path. Before long Rusty is training with the Aerial Fire Fighters at Piston Peak Air Attack Base. Becoming a Single Engine Air Tanker (SEAT) is no simple task for an injured plane, but with the guidance of seasoned fire-and-rescue helicopter Blade Ranger (voice of Ed Harris), fearless leader of the Piston Peak Air Attack team, Rusty is soon soaring through the clouds once again. Meanwhile, as Rusty gets up to speed, his presence in the unit catches the attention of Dipper (voice of Julie Bowen), a cargo hauler-turned-water scooper capable of skimming lake water to combat raging fires. A major racing fan, Dipper can hardly contain her excitement at the prospect of working alongside Rusty, and meanwhile wise, heavy-lift helicopter Windlifter (voice of Wes Studi) has never encountered a fire he couldn't conquer. In no time Rusty has made a whole host of new friends at Piston Peak, including hulking transport plane Cabbie (voice of Dale Dye), the brave grounded firefighters known as the Smokejumpers, the Secretary of the Interior (voice of Fred Willard), and Nick "Loop'n" Lopez (voice of Erik Estrada), a helicopter cop with an illustrious past. And though learning the secrets to dousing forest fires is sure to take time, Rusty is a fast learner, and eager to pitch in(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan named Ella is treated cruelly by her stepmother and stepsisters, who force her to do menial chores. However, her life changes forever when she meets a prince(n)

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a family find themselves having the worst day ever!(n)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie stars as the dark fairy who places a terrible curse on the king's daughter in this spectacular fairy tale adventure. With Elle Fanning(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: A little girl accidentally enters the land of monsters, where she befriends two creatures who work at a "scare factory"(n)

programme.title: Millions
programme.desc: Director Danny Boyle revisits a theme from his Shallow Grave and Trainspotting days -- greed -- but focuses on a much younger protagonist with this comedy drama. Millions opens with recent widower Ronnie (James Nesbitt) moving his two precocious pre-pubescent sons to the suburbs. Missing his mother and the comforts of his old neighborhood, the young Damian (Alex Etel) builds a cardboard-box fort on the outskirts of the suburb, where one day his placid introvert existence is literally crushed by a giant gym bag full of thousands of pounds' worth of cash. Less concerned with the origin of the money than with how to spend it, Damian and his older brother, Anthony (Lewis McGibbon), decide to keep it a secret from their father, which becomes an increasingly tricky proposition as the days pass. His conscience getting in the way of his spending, Damian debates the ethics of his ill-gotten gains with a handful of imaginary saints, and begins to try to spend his cash a little more altruistically. But his charitable deeds inadvertently attract the attention of a mysterious, threatening man who's desperate to get his hands on the money. Marking a distinct change of pace for Boyle after the horror film 28 Days Later, Millions world-premiered at the 2004 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Golfing drama about a washed-up old pro who tries to get back into the big time. Roy 'Tin Cup' McAvoy (Kevin Costner) ruined his career when he took a risk on the golf course which led to his disqualification from the game. Now he teaches golf to others at a driving range in Salome, Texas, with the help of his trusted friend Romeo Posar (Cheech Marin). But McAvoy's life starts to change when a new student walks into the training centre - Dr Molly Griswold (Rene Russo), who just happens to be dating PGA star David Simms (Don Johnson). To win Molly, 'Tin Cup' knows that he must impress her - and what better way than by beating Simms and winning the US Open? The problem, of course, is that 'Tin Cup' has been teaching golf for so long that he may have forgotten how to play!(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Next Nostradamus
programme.desc: Many are overly familiar with the eerily prescient foretellings of 16th Century French prophet Michel de Nostradame, (1503-66). But few may realize that an early 21st century equivalent of Nostradamus began making prophecies comparable to those of the Middle Ages' most prominent seer - with the aid of a computer -in the late 1980s. Dr. Bueno de Mesquita's prophecies (unlike Nostradame's) were concrete enough that they actually enabled observers to predict events before those events occurred, including the second Intifada and the crackdown at Tianamen Square by the Chinese government. Then, de Mesquita emerged with a host of much darker and more foreboding prophecies including famine, World War III, and the arrival of the Antichrist. This documentary from The History Channel profiles de Mesquita and draws striking parallels between his work and that of Nostradamus, and raises key questions about what might lie ahead for humanity based on the conclusions of de Mesquita's work(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Angel One. The Enterprise travels to Angel One, a planet run by women, to search for survivors from a Federation freighter disabled seven years earlier by an asteroid collision(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: 11001001. The Enterprise docks at Starbase 74 to upgrade the ship's computer system, but the Bynars, a species interdependent with computers, lead them into a deadly trap(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: School Reunion. Bat-like creatures are haunting a contemporary London school. While investigating, the Doctor runs into an old friend, Sarah Jane Smith, who's already on the case(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Girl in the Fireplace. The palace of Versailles is under attack by evil droids in 18th-century France. Madame de Pompadour's (Sophia Myles) only hope is the Doctor, a stranger she's never met, except in mysterious dreams she's had since childhood(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Violations. Troi, Riker and Dr Crusher fall into mysterious comas while the Enterprise plays host to an alien race of historians who conduct research by probing their subjects' memories(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Masterpiece Society. Investigating the aftereffects of a runaway cosmic fragment, the Enterprise comes across a race of genetically engineered people. Captain Picard immediately sets about to save this "perfect" society from the potential disaster caused by the fragment. But by doing so, Picard may well destroy the very people he'd hoped to rescue. First telecast February 15, 1992, "The Masterpiece Society" was written by James Kahn, Adam Belanoff, and Michael Piller(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Conundrum. The crew of the Enterprise experiences memory loss and becomes engaged in a baffling battle with the Lysians. MacDuff: Erich Anderson. Picard: Patrick Stewart. Data: Brent Spiner. Geordi: LeVar Burton. Dr. Crusher: Gates McFadden. Worf: Michael Dorn(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Ocean Deep. In this part, David looks at the largest of all habitats - the ocean. From the surface to the distant abyss, it encompasses 90 per cent of all the living space on our planet(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Seasonal Forests. Forests are examined, from California to Siberia to Madagascar. Included: different species of trees. Sigourney Weaver narrates(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Shallow Seas. David Attenborough celebrates our planet in all its glory. Here, the epic journey of a humpback whale and calf from a tropical paradise to storm-ravaged icy polar seas(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Jungles. Jungle ecosystems are examined. Included: animals indigenous to jungles, including primates and birds, and the unique plant life of these rich environments. Narrated by Sigourney Weaver(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Great Plains. Grasslands, prairies, plains and savannas are examined, including areas of Mongolia, Africa and Papua New Guinea. Also: Arctic tundra(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Ice Worlds. Frozen regions of the world, including the poles and the tops of mountain ranges, are explored. Featured: organisms that can survive in the coldest conditions on Earth. Narrated by Sigourney Weaver(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Deserts. Amazing documentary series which celebrates our planet, hosted by David Attenborough. A look at the deserts, a third of the Earth's land surface, home to camels and guanacos(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: The Hunt
programme.desc: Nowhere to Hide - Plains. Hunting in the desert and grasslands is examined, featuring cheetahs, bald eagles and lions(n)
